description: Pod is a collection of containers that can run on a host. This resource is created by clients and scheduled onto hosts.

status.description: Most recently observed status of the pod. This data may not be up to date. Populated by the system. Read-only. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/devel/api-conventions.md#spec-and-status

spec.description: Specification of the desired behavior of the pod. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/devel/api-conventions.md#spec-and-status
